'''Wubi''' ('''W'''indows '''Ub'''untu '''I'''nstaller)is an official [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]]-based [[free software]] installer for [[Ubuntu (Linux distribution)|Ubuntu]], licensed under the [[GNU General Public License|GPL]].<ref name="WubiFAQ">{{cite web | url=http://wubi-installer.org/faq.php | title=Wubi - FAQ | publisher=Wubi | accessdate=2007-06-23}}</ref> Lubi functions similarly to Wubi, however, Lubi uses GNU/Linux as the host system instead of Windows.<ref>[http://lubi.sourceforge.net/lubi.html Lubi, LVPM, UNetbootin, and Bubakup - Lubi<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
+
'''Wubi''' ('''W'''indows '''Ub'''untu '''I'''nstaller) is an official [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]]-based [[free software]] installer for [[Ubuntu (Linux distribution)|Ubuntu]], licensed under the [[GNU General Public License|GPL]].<ref name="WubiFAQ">{{cite web | url=http://wubi-installer.org/faq.php | title=Wubi - FAQ | publisher=Wubi | accessdate=2007-06-23}}</ref> Lubi functions similarly to Wubi, however, Lubi uses GNU/Linux as the host system instead of Windows.<ref>[http://lubi.sourceforge.net/lubi.html Lubi, LVPM, UNetbootin, and Bubakup - Lubi<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
Wubi was born as an independent project, as such 7.04 and 7.10 are unoffical releases. But since 8.04 the code has been merged within Ubuntu and since 8.04 alpha 5, Wubi can also be found in the Ubuntu Live CD <ref>[http://wubi.sourceforge.net/faq.php Wubi - FAQ<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> and has been included on the new Ubuntu 7.10 Gutsy Gibbon distribution.<ref>{{cite web | url=http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=425557 | title=Discussions for Wubi inclusion in Gutsy | publisher=Ubuntu Forums | author=Henrik | date=[[2007-04-27]] | accessdate=2007-06-23}}</ref><ref>{{cite web | url=https://wiki.ubuntu.com/InstallerForWindows | title="Installer For Windows - Ubuntu Wiki | publisher=Ubuntu | accessdate=2007-06-23}}</ref>
Wubi was born as an independent project, as such 7.04 and 7.10 are unoffical releases. But since 8.04 the code has been merged within Ubuntu and since 8.04 alpha 5, Wubi can also be found in the Ubuntu Live CD <ref>[http://wubi.sourceforge.net/faq.php Wubi - FAQ<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> and has been included on the new Ubuntu 7.10 Gutsy Gibbon distribution.<ref>{{cite web | url=http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=425557 | title=Discussions for Wubi inclusion in Gutsy | publisher=Ubuntu Forums | author=Henrik | date=[[2007-04-27]] | accessdate=2007-06-23}}</ref><ref>{{cite web | url=https://wiki.ubuntu.com/InstallerForWindows | title="Installer For Windows - Ubuntu Wiki | publisher=Ubuntu | accessdate=2007-06-23}}</ref>
